channel.title: TRITON • Where YOU come first • ::authdc b2D4uZaKq for a free daily reward! •
channel.description:
[center][img]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/b1ar4imk1rl99mw/ezgif-2780500583%20%281%29.gif?dl=0[/img][/center]
[center]Forums - [url=http://www.triton-rsps.com/ref.php?mopar]CLICK HERE[/url]
Download - [url=http://www.triton-rsps.com/game/client/TritonLoader.zip]CLICK HERE[/url][/center]
[center]Triton is a new private server with an existing community that aims to satisfy the community by providing the best and most up to date content. Everything you would expect from a runescape private server in 2016 is provided for you here at Triton. Our server is solely community driven which means we rely on our community to provide suggestions and feedback to our game updates, and ultimately this is what will decide whether content comes or goes from our game. You are the creator.[/center]
[center]Here at Triton, you only need to download our client loader once. Once you have downloaded our loader, it will automatically check if your game files need updating, and then proceeds to update them if needed to make sure your game is completely up to date. Effortless play is an understatement to describe Triton's gameplay and updating.
The Triton team is dedicated to providing you with the best experience, and within our community, we believe that nothing is 'perfect' or 'flawless' and we are constantly striving to improve our content to make sure you as a player get the utmost enjoyment from our game. Triton also operates in a professional environment to make sure you feel comfortable with the staff team, development team, and community as a whole.
With our dedication towards providing you an enjoyable, unique experience and your time set aside to be a part of a growing, friendly community, we can become a server like no other. What are you waiting for?[/center]
[center][b]Features[/b][/center] [center]Item colour customisation Full duelling (custom rules) Fullscreen/Resizable Referral system Voter of the week, donator of the month and lottery Client customisation Item drag tweaking In-game colour pickers CTRL item selection Custom trading Unique strategic bosses More item containers Bank slots Bank tabs Bank searching Achievements Boss kill log Questing Untradable item storage Lottery Gambling Money pouch incorporated with trade Pet cage On demand loading Custom pets Trivia Duo sessions (Social sessions) Adventure log Loyalty rewards Killstreaks Mystery well Automated tournaments Maxhit HUD Wilderness events 20+ bosses (with 07 bosses) Wilderness bosses Boss instancing Temporary abilities Account guardian with email (99% unhackable accounts) Player kits Grand exchange Prestige Warrior's guild Full barrows Drop party room Godwars Balanced combat Passive items Account modes Ironman mode Working degradable corrupt items Npc head icons (cyclable) Better npc logic Pest control Custom drop npc drop tables Automatic voting Server-website integration Curses Good following (combat/non combat) No dupes Friendly community[/center]

[quote="X-J-K-X"]We now have a toplist spot on rune-server.
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/ecfa3374f6855d7d40dc0a3d1c813651.png[/img]
We will be purchasing a sponsored position on mopar in June! Plenty of updates are rolling out and growing by the day. Come check us out![/quote]
We now have a toplist spot on mopar. [img]https://i.gyazo.com/9a14671d9cd1be8b379694b9b5b92e88.png[/img]
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/9dd0a56cb2850c3803045d5807e5882b.png[/img]
[QUOTE=Eobard Cowan;4865505]Looks wicked, if you didn't leech this good job!! Nice skull timer orb (y) Unique!
I wish you the best of luck mate.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=The Reverse;4865578]This looks really good, might hop on later.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Delinquent;4865628]Looks really great, might take a look soon[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Shire;4865717]gonna give it a go, good luck. :yes:
OT: checked it out, lots of players already, has potential. :)[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=qpdb;4865880]Goodjob on this, I see potential.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Fayde;4867609]Nice forums. Goodluck![/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=pSinnott;4868866]Looking good, good luck!![/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=kemsys;4868990]This Server is one of the best around ![/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=BossLetsPlay;4871145]Good luck![/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=ItsYourBoy;4888816]Looks nice, but use a higher quality gifs next time.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Kamilio;4923251]good looking server good luck.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Dsafa;4945065]WOW, that was my first impression looks great might check out in the next few hours, good luck I hope you make it far.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=kyoto;4947767]Looks good, goodluck :)[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Swiffy;4947773]You used project-exile, right? I recognize that ugly grand exchange lol. Good luck nonetheless. :yes:[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Swag DenTal;4956045]Nice one, will check it out soon.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=FRELITIVE;4956051]Nice :) Coming to play.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=LoveandPower;4958601]I don't think the media really represents everything that is available on the server. I think also for those players who seek it out there is an actual community on here and it's growing. They are trying to keep the community mature and to improve content daily. Players are always concerned about economy and try to keep everything clean.
I have enjoyed my time so far on the server
-Harry Potter[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Mojo!;4967214]Looks good willing to try[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Hitten;4968660]I think it's funny how so many servers are copying my drop selecting system. Gl with the server i guess. Looks good, however for your comp cape customization, i don't like how it opens an external windows that lets you pick the color. It would be cool if you had one built ingame.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Gnakos;5153797]Good luck with this, looks neat![/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Vippy;5153813]look good mate, good luck![/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=toxic.;5153820]Server is amazing and has a very friendly community![/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Australian lad;5153916]Looks okay, good luck lad.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=hxze;5153924]Some of the content you've added looks nice, though the text on the interfaces is ugly. Best of luck.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Divine;5153936]good luck :yes:[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=01053;5153939]Good luck looks pretty decent content wise.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Naturals;5153973]looks nice, I might try it out.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Roy X D;5154564]some interfaces are nice, goodluck with the server lads[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Royal;5155225]Good luck Phil :yes:[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Vippy;5157810]Looks like it's going well fellas. Good work[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=King Tinder;5165510]Glad to be a part of this community![/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Fires;5153808]Was scanning this and got the following result:
Don't know what that really is, but if you know tell me..
Nonetheless the server looks good, and the interfaces are amazing, gl.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=woodenxspoon;5165531]Dh is is broken overpowered, +1[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=Kifed;5165533]Really fun server, honestly really enjoying it. +1 siport[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=kemsys;5165540]Looks so FREAKING great, cannot wait to get online man !!!!!!!!!![/QUOTE]
[QUOTE=The Reverse;5165909]This looks amazing and really unique, might hop on later.[/QUOTE]

item.title: TRITON • Where YOU come first • ::authdc b2D4uZaKq for a free daily reward! •
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

In-game colour pickers will now be used for all item customisation and colour changing. Images will be updated as the interface advances

Support for three colour mixing coming soon



Addressed an issue where disconnected players would sometimes not be removed from the online list, causing a few issues when they log back in.

Client settings are now handled client sided.

Read full topic
